name: GhostLabel
author: DM Brad
short: Sync Discord roles to Ghost labels.
description: Automatically syncs Discord role membership to Ghost member labels. Maps Discord roles to Ghost labels and updates Ghost members accordingly at configurable intervals.
install_msg: Set your Ghost API keys with [p]set api ghost key_id,<id> key_secret,<secret> then configure with [p]ghostlabel url and [p]ghostlabel set <role> <label>.
end_user_data_statement: This cog reads Discord user IDs from Ghost member notes (set by GhostSync). No user data is stored by the cog itself.
